body:
## Release Notes

- Don't abort the restyled workflow before uploading a patch. @iphydf (#78)
- Upload restyled diff as artifact. @iphydf (#77)
- Add release drafter common github action. @iphydf (#76)
- Don't try to restyle submodules. @iphydf (#75)
- Add restyled workflow in common CI actions. @iphydf (#74)
- Update github actions. @iphydf (#73)
- Migrate from haskell/actions/setup to haskell-actions/setup. @iphydf (#72)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#71)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#70)
- Update setup-haskell action to latest version. @iphydf (#69)
- Fix version tag for buildifier. @iphydf (#68)
- Update GH action uses to their latest versions. @iphydf (#67)
- Add stack-haddock-upload script to upload docs to hackage. @iphydf (#20)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#22)
- Use actual json parser instead of grep to get release tag name. @iphydf (#19)

## Features

- Add a release-soon workflow to check if we should release soon. @iphydf (#89)
- Support toxic's version location. @iphydf (#82)
- Check the PR milestone matches the upcoming draft release. @iphydf (#81)
- Add common CI checks to be shared by all repos. @iphydf (#62)
- Support reading from stdin in stylish-haskell-lhs. @iphydf (#50)
- Add support for dpkg-divert'ed stylish-haskell. @iphydf (#49)
- Add Haskell workflows that can be called from other repos. @iphydf (#35)
- Add `hackage_upload` script used by Haskell GH actions. @iphydf (#28)
- Add `check_release` script, used by other repos. @iphydf (#27)

## Bug Fixes

- Check out the PR head instead of merge commit in restyled. @iphydf (#88)
- Respect the local_required bool. @iphydf (#85)
- Actually handle all the cases of versions being available or not. @iphydf (#84)
- Allow milestone to be empty. @iphydf (#83)
- Terminate restyled action with error if a patch exists. @iphydf (#80)
- It's `git-patch` instead of `patch`. @iphydf (#79)
- Fix bzl file parser. @iphydf (#65)
- Ignore empty response from github api. @iphydf (#64)
- Move workflows to workflows toplevel directory. @iphydf (#37)
- Move workflows to .github. @iphydf (#36)
- Disable release version check when there's no draft release. @iphydf (#34)
- Don't evaluate BUILD.bazel. @iphydf (#32)
- Fail the hackage_upload script on upload failure. @iphydf (#30)
- Fix hackage upload URL for package candidates. @iphydf (#29)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add hub-restyled link to restyled errors. @iphydf (#87)
- Update buildifier to v7.3.1. @iphydf (#86)
- Try to download buildifier 3 times before giving up. @iphydf (#66)
- Print API response for debugging. @iphydf (#63)
- Run tests and build source package for haskell stack builds. @iphydf (#61)
- Install third party dependencies in doc generation. @iphydf (#60)
- Use toktok-stack:haskell instead of toxchat/haskell. @iphydf (#59)
- Use the github actions `container` setting. @iphydf (#57)
- Fix image reference. @iphydf (#56)
- Remove docker buildcache. @iphydf (#55)
- Use toxchat/haskell image. @iphydf (#54)
- Use github repo name for the docker tag. @iphydf (#52)
- Push haskell CI docker images to dockerhub. @iphydf (#51)
- Use BUILD.bazel instead of cabal file for cache keys. @iphydf (#48)
- Force a cabal update before build. @iphydf (#47)
- Add secrets for hackage upload. @iphydf (#46)
- Downgrade ghc to 8.10.3. @iphydf (#45)
- Downgrade ghc to 8.10.7. @iphydf (#44)
- Allow stack build to recover caches from other ghc versions. @iphydf (#43)
- Don't restore from unversioned cache keys. @iphydf (#42)
- Add options to workflows to set the ghc version. @iphydf (#41)
- Simplify workflow job names. @iphydf (#40)
- Make cache key depend on ghc version. @iphydf (#39)
- Give workflows human readable names. @iphydf (#38)
- Make path argument in check_release optional. @iphydf (#31)
name: v0.8.1
